name: Greedent ex
author: 5ban Graphics
tera_effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Never Ever Enough
attacks.effect: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put those cards into your hand. If you don’t, discard those cards and draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Slip ‘n’ Roll
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t use Slip ‘n’ Roll.

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
